resources.string: We will be collecting your call and SMS records as it is stored on your device along with your tagging information consisting of your relationship with the contact, the contact\'s age and the contact\'s gender.
Thank you for participating in this mad experiment blah blah blah. Please follow r/IllegallySmolCats on reddit. KTHNXBYE.
Our Kickass Team : Irene, Sumukh, Dhanya, GMK
